rules_text:
Flash
When Cass, Impressionable Prodigy enters, copy target spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. [i](A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)[/i]
rules_text2:
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Flawless Recreation: You gain 3 life.
When you sacrifice Flawless Recreation, you may return up to one target noncreature card from your graveyard to your hand.
